citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
At time of inspection, disposition documentation of the Three-Banded Armadillo "Roswell" to an unlicensed exhibitor on 26
April 2023, was not available for review. The armadillo was exhibited at the Pima County Fair in Tucson, Arizona on 26
April 2023 unbeknownst to the licensee. The licensee stated that he let a friend borrow the armadillo for a few hours and
was not aware it was for exhibition. Exhibitors shall have required records available for examination by inspectors during
business hours. The licensee submitted the required documentation via email to the inspector same day of inspection
after business hours.
Correct by 25 MAY 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
ALEXANDRA ANDRICOS, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
At time of inspection, disposition documentation of the Three-Banded Armadillo "Roswell" to an unlicensed exhibitor on 26 
April 2023, was not available for review.  The armadillo was exhibited at the Pima County Fair in Tucson, Arizona on 26 
April 2023 unbeknownst to the licensee.  The licensee stated that he let a friend borrow the armadillo for a few hours and 
was not aware it was for exhibition.  Exhibitors shall have required records available for examination by inspectors during 
business hours. The licensee submitted the required documentation via email to the inspector same day of inspection 
after business hours. 
 
Correct by 25 MAY 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
ALEXANDRA ANDRICOS, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
